basic.description: This course provides a framework and specific procedures for using financial statement information. Potential topics in this course include (but are not limited to): financial statement ratio analysis, construction of pro forma financial statements, forecasting, and fundamental valuation analysis.
basic.subject: ACG
basic.title: Financial Statement Analysis

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: ACG 5026 or ACG 3101 or ACG 3171.
